title: typeface for 'radical software'!
content:
i really need to know what the typeface used for 'radical software' is...please help!!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [type.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420132357/http:/typophile.com/files/type_83.jpg) | 35 KB |
author: aloominum

comments.content:
1970, the era of photo-composition lettering. The closest available design is from Letraset, Compacta Bold Outline, designed by Fred Lambert for Letraset in 1963-5:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420132357im_/http:/typophile.com/files/CompactaBoldOutline_5902.jpg)
  
It has been published by Eisner + Flake as [Compacta Bold Outline OT](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420132357/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/elsnerflake/compacta_bold_outline_ot/).  
There was also a Compacta Outline which was slightly narrower & with lighter lines. AFAIK no digital version, but I stand to be informed.  
Don
